reuters.title: KELLWOOD <KWD> BUYING THREE COMPANIES
reuters.body: Kellwood Co said it signed a definitive agreement to acquire Robert Scott Ltd Inc, David Brooks Ltd Inc and Andrew Harvey Ltd of Dedham, Mass. Terms were not disclosed. Combined sales of the three companies in 1986 were over 50 mln dlrs, it said. The deals are expected to be completed by July 31, Kellwood said. Reuter 
